figure_1.title: Figure 1:
figure_1.caption: Photographs of the patient’s clinical findings including A) Necrotic ulcer with eschar formation and surrounding induration in the right mid-axillary line near the flank; B) close up of anterior chest wall lesion pictured in (A); and C) posterior aspect of right flank.

claims.sentence: Palliative care was consulted early during the admission due to exquisitely painful ulcerations in his intertriginous areas and flank (Figure 1).

Figure 1:



Open in a new tab
Photographs of the patient’s clinical findings including A) Necrotic ulcer with eschar formation and surrounding induration in the right mid-axillary line near the flank; B) close up of anterior chest wall lesion pictured in (A); and C) posterior aspect of right flank.The patient struggled with obesity since childhood and several of his relatives had obesity.
Palliative care was consulted early during the admission due to exquisitely painful ulcerations in his intertriginous areas and flank (Figure 1).
